accessibility.text: DESI VI. Cosmological constraints - Aug 2024 XII ICNFP @ Crete, Greece, 2024
Overall, DESI surpasses its predecessors in terms of speed and quality of data:
One single night collects 200,000 extragalactic redshifts \u2028(same order as the entire 6dF Galaxy Survey (6dFGS), which operated between\u20282001 and 2006)
Ten times faster to collect photos than SDSS
DESI VI. Cosmological constraints - Aug 2024 XII ICNFP @ Crete, Greece, 2024
